title: Spamhaus and Surbl REST interface
description:
Rest api to verify if an url has been marked as spam using the well known spamhaus and surbl services.

Supports: SpamHaus zen (SBL e-mail spam, XBL infected PCs, PBL unsolicited smtp traffic) Surbl multi (Spamcop, sa-blacklist, Outblaze, Abusebutler, Phishtank, Zeus tracker, jwSpamSpy, Prolocation)
